title: Socialist Autonomous Province of Kosovo
summary: The Socialist Autonomous Province of Kosovo (Serbian: Социјалистичка Аутономна Покрајина Косово, romanized: Socijalistička Autonomna Pokrajina Kosovo; Albanian: Krahina Socialiste Autonome e Kosovës), comprising the Kosovo region, was one of the two autonomous provinces of Serbia within Yugoslavia (the other being Vojvodina), between 1945 and 1990, when it was renamed Autonomous Province of Kosovo and Metohija.
